Question: Livermore found what she called this person's "theology of suffering" to be flawed, despite being a good and courageous person.
Hints: This person Day (Dita e Nënë Terezës) on 19 October is a public holiday in Albania.
Indian views on this person were not uniformly favourable.
This person accepted donations from the autocratic and corrupt Duvalier family in Haiti and openly praised them.
